Description: A local identifier to reference and merge the items by. Must be unique within a given array of items.
A description of the goods, services to be provided.
The primary classification for the item. See the itemClassificationScheme to identify preferred classification lists, including CPV and GSIN. See Classification

An array of additional classifications for the item. See the itemClassificationScheme codelist for common options to use in OCDS. This may also be used to present codes from an internal classification scheme. See Classification section for further details.
Description of the unit which the good comes in e.g. hours, kilograms. Made up of a unit name, and the value of a single unit.
